mapper.sql: select adee.id, adee.user_id, adee.dept_id, adee.discussant_user_id, adee.assessment_year, adee.status, adee.recommend_grade, adee.create_time, adee.update_time, adee.create_by, adee.update_by, adee.del_flag,adee.escalation,adee.identity_type, u.name,d.dept_name,u2.name as discussant_user_name from biz_assess_dept_excellent_evaluation adee inner join sys_user u on adee.user_id=u.user_id inner join sys_dept d on adee.dept_id=d.dept_id inner join sys_user u2 on adee.discussant_user_id=u2.user_id
mapper.select: select count(*) as countTotal from biz_assess_dept_excellent_evaluation where discussant_user_id=#{discussantUserId} and status = '0'

select t.user_id,t.assessment_year,u.name,t.dept_id,d.dept_name,t.recommendGradeExcellent,t.number,t.reviewed,0 as escalation, u.identity_type from (select user_id,assessment_year,dept_id,sum(if(recommend_grade='1',1,0))as recommendGradeExcellent, count(*) as number,sum(if(status='1',1,0)) as reviewed from biz_assess_dept_excellent_evaluation
and user_id = #{userId} and dept_id = #{deptId} and assessment_year = #{assessmentYear}
group by user_id,assessment_year,dept_id) t inner join sys_user u on t.user_id=u.user_id inner join sys_dept d on t.dept_id=d.dept_id
and u.name like concat('%',#{recommendGrade},'%') and d.dept_name like concat('%',#{deptName},'%')
order by t.recommendGradeExcellent asc
select assessment_year from biz_assess_dept_excellent_evaluation group by assessment_year order by assessment_year desc
